song_name: Wishing For A Hero (feat. BJ The Chicago Kid)
artist_names: Polo G, BJ The Chicago Kid

102 contributorstranslationsрусскийwishing for a hero lyricsverse polo g
well respected in this hiphop lil polo be spittin facts
a lot of rappers doin way more stuntin than givin back
you aint my color then you don’t know the struggle of livin black
cops kill us and we protest what type of shit is that
man if the police shoot at one of my brothers im blickin back
we hate each other so we just wanna score and go titfortat
all these shorties want is points they aint chasin a different stat
really riskin it all what’s the point when that nigga rat
we seventeen got forty years in that court when we gettin cracked

its all a setup no wonder why they call this bitch a trap
life was messed up a matter of time til that nigga snap
posttraumatic stress so them triggers keep gettin tapped
rip malcolm i promise to conquer and fill them gaps

now if you stare into my soul youll see my bros in me

so now the other side wanna put a hole in me
like every day might be the end of the road for me

all in my head go and kill what they told to me

needed money and grew accustomed to this fast life
pressure from this way of livin so we blast pipes
shit got me stressin three hundred and sixtyfive nights
them people workin against us like we dont have rights
it dont matter what this money and this fame can give

wish we could go back to them days when we played as kids
